hero.title: Chain Fox - Blockchain Guardian
hero.subtitle: Automated analysis platform for blockchain projects and smart contracts, democratizing security for all developers

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bring automated analysis to blockchain security, making it more accessible and democratic for all developers.

workflow.title: How It Works
workflow.subtitle: Our platform operates through four main steps

upload.title: Upload Your Project
upload.description: Submit your blockchain or smart contract project through our secure platform (public repositories or private code).

detect.title: Automated Detection
detect.description: Our engine runs a comprehensive audit using cutting-edge static and dynamic analysis tools, including proprietary bug detectors.

report.title: Receive Report
report.description: Get detailed analysis of identified issues, including bug type, root cause, and suggested fixes.

upgrade.title: Upgrade for Deep Insights
upgrade.description: Optionally upgrade for advanced reports, optimization suggestions (like gas fee reduction), or connection with top auditors.

expertTools.title: Expert-Built Detection Tools
expertTools.description: Based on years of static and dynamic bug detection and verification research, with proven success on Ethereum, Solana, Polkadot, and more.

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multiPlatform.description: Support for Rust, Go, Solidity, and more, tailored for blockchain systems and smart contracts.

oneClickReport.title: One-Click Reports
oneClickReport.description: No need to install complex tools. Clear, actionable insights without interpreting vague warnings.

latestResearch.title: Latest Research Integration
latestResearch.description: Automatically incorporates the newest academic and industry detection tools.

openSource.title: Open Source Core with Production-Grade Service
openSource.description: Simplifies the complexity of open-source tools, providing results without deployment headaches.

security.title: Security and Confidentiality
security.description: Private projects stay private. Code is encrypted, never shared, and deleted upon request.

marketing.title: Marketing & Listing
marketing.description: 3% for marketing efforts and exchange listings

replace_audit.question: Can this replace human audits?
replace_audit.answer: Not entirely - it provides a quick, economical baseline assurance. For high-risk deployments, we help connect with human auditors.

bug_types.question: What types of bugs can it detect?
bug_types.answer: Memory issues, concurrency bugs, gas inefficiencies, unsafe coding patterns - all tailored for blockchain environments.

private_code.question: What if my code is private?
private_code.answer: Code is encrypted during upload, handled securely, and deleted after scanning if chosen.

ci_cd.question: Can I integrate it into my CI/CD pipeline?
ci_cd.answer: Yes - API and GitHub Actions integrations are coming soon for continuous security checks.

languages.question: Which languages are supported?
languages.answer: Rust, Go, Solidity (with more coming soon), optimized for blockchain system components and smart contracts.

vulnerabilities.question: How do you keep up with new vulnerabilities?
vulnerabilities.answer: We track the latest academic research, CVEs, and industry trends, continuously improving our tools and detection logic.

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.subtitle: Chain Fox has detected and helped fix bugs in major blockchain projects

currentStatus.title: Current Status
currentStatus.description: Our detection tools are complete, but the platform is still under heavy development and coming soon. Feel free to ask questions on X (formerly Twitter).
